sections.title: Role in Diseases

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Applicable because gene/protein articles typically start with an infobox summarizing key points.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The section lacks an infobox, which is mandatory at the top of each article for gene/protein articles.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: There is no adherence to the requirement as no infobox is present.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: Relevant if the gene/protein has a human ortholog.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The infobox GNF protein is not present.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: There is no adherence as the correct infobox for genes/proteins with human orthologs is missing.

sections.meta_notes: The section provides descriptive content but lacks the required infobox summarizing key aspects of the gene/protein. Adding an infobox would greatly improve adherence to the guidelines.
